name: Ashis Ray
role: Academic Visitor at St Antony’s College
bio: London-based, Ashis Ray has been a foreign correspondent since 1977, broadcasting mainly on BBC and CNN. He has also been an Academic Visitor at St Antony’s College, University of Oxford. He can be followed @ashiscray on X. .

name: Salman Khurshid
role: Prominent Indian politician, designated Senior Advocate, and author affiliated with the Indian National Congress
bio: Salman Khurshid served as the Minister of External Affairs of India from October 2012 to May 2014. An alumnus of St. Stephen's College, Delhi, and St Edmund Hall, Oxford, he has a distinguished legal and political career. He has also held other key cabinet positions, including Minister of Law and Justice.
